The closer the player is to the Carnot cycle, the higher their score and progress.
instructions: The player must click the button to switch between the thermal sources of the system remembering to make the transitions at the right moments to avoid the piston jamming or the cylinder exploding The Carnot cycle consists of four thermodynamic processes

Your goal? Launch arrows and rack up points by hitting other stars! But watch out – the cosmos is filled with more than just celestial targets.
instructions: Aim for stars and not on enemy objects

title: Toxic Drip
description: Toxic Drip is an eerie and thrilling match-3 puzzle game set in a dark and spooky world. Players must match toxic-themed items, such as skulls, eyeballs, and pumpkins, to clear the board and score points. As the levels progress, the toxic drip gets faster and the puzzles become more challenging, making each new stage an exciting test of your skills. With creepy visuals, eerie sound effects, and intuitive gameplay, Toxic Drip provides an engaging experience for players who love spooky games. Key Features: Creepy Visuals: Experience a world filled with toxic-themed graphics, including skulls, pumpkins, eyeballs, and more. Match-3 Puzzle Gamepl
instructions: Desktop Use your mouse to click and match 3 or more identical toxic-themed items Mobile Tap on the screen to select and match items Swapping Drag an item to swap its position with an adjacent one to create a match of 3 or more
